display_name: PSG Results: Calculated - RDI in supine body position (>= 2% desaturation)
description: missing if sleep time in supine position is 0 or if position sensore was not working or if studies scored as sleep/wake
calculation: rdim2ps  = 60*(hrembp2 + hnrbp2 + carbp2 + canbp2 + oarbp2 + oanbp2 + marbp2 + manrbp2)/(remepbp+nremepbp)
